dt: {bc}to alter or change the hue or color of
{bc}to change color especially for the worse

et: Middle English {it}discolouren{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}desculurer{/it}, from Late Latin {it}discolorari{/it}, from Latin {it}discolor{/it} of another color, from {it}dis-{/it} + {it}color{/it} color
